title: "a server error occurred"
body: windows had a problem with the client?..idk  then i have a que time penalty after my group was purged by the server???

replies.body:
If you mean [this error](http://imgur.com/uAEQda5), then it's just a visual thing at the moment that shouldn't be affecting anything else.

If you're experiencing a different error, then can you happen to provide a screenshot of the error?  If not, then it'd help to know where in the client you had the error (e.g. in champion select, before the game loaded, while you were browsing the store, etc.) so that we can investigate further
wish i would have know that i have restarted countless times already lol
I am getting this error at the moment. [Maestro](http://prntscr.com/b3ev6f)
